commit.message:
8294186: AArch64: VectorMaskToLong failed on SVE2 machine with -XX:UseSVE=1

C2_MacroAssembler::sve_vmask_tolong would fail on BITPERM supported SVE2
machine with "-XX:UseSVE=1".

BITPERM is an optional feature in SVE2. With this feature,
VectorMaskToLong has a more efficent implementation. For other cases, it
should generate SVE1 code.

[TEST]
jdk/incubator/vector, hotspot/compiler/vectorapi passed on BITPERM
supported SVE2 machine, with option -XX:UseSVE=(0, 1, 2).

Change-Id: Ia772d68c3b8e20f80fcbffbdcd5956fe49670add
